General.Name: Nanogroup SA
General.Description: NanoGroup S.A. operates as a biotechnology company. The company develops and licenses early-stage biotechnology and medical projects in the areas of oncology, transplantology, and blood donations to international biotech companies and pharmaceutical companies. NanoGroup S.A. was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
